name: Grapple Smash
description:
Grapple smash is an arcade game with killer mobility. Firing your grappling hook turns you into a deadly weapon. Each round you can choose different power-ups to help you fight through more rounds. I KNOW YOU WANT TO SMASH!

CONTROLS:

WASD to move. Click to shoot grappling hook. SPACE to use a power-up that requires activation (most don't).
